entry.title: pratikyelwande/SEIM: A lightweight SIEM system built with Express.js and React.js. It collects logs, performs port scans, and displays real-time security data on a dashboard. Designed to simplify network monitoring and threat detection, enabling quick responses to vulnerabilities.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: BrokingSapphire/FormFillerJS: FormFillerJS is a lightweight, asynchronous Node.js project designed to dynamically fill PDF form fields using the pdf-lib library. entry.content: FormFillerJS is a lightweight, asynchronous Node.js project designed to dynamically fill PDF form fields using the pdf-lib library. It supports reading, modifying, and saving PDF files with ease and flexibility, allowing user inputs to be injected dynamically.
